import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Mail, Phone, MapPin, Globe, ExternalLink } from 'lucide-react'; const Footer = () => { return (
{/* About Column */}

College Clubs Information Portal

The official central hub for organizing, managing, and discovering extracurricular activities within the institution. Promoting holistic development through collaboration and innovation across all clubs and student chapters.

{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

  • Clubs Directory
  • Notice Board
  • Upcoming Events
  • Register New Club
  • Helpdesk & Support
{/* Contact Details */}

Connect

  • SAC Building, North Campus,
    Engineering College GECP
  • +91-123-456-7890
  • clubs.portal@college.edu.in
{/* Deep Footer */}

© 2026 Student Affairs Division. Content Managed by Students Council.

Privacy Policy Terms of Service Sitemap

Last Updated: Feb 12, 2026

); }; export default Footer;

messages.message:
Error: Cannot call impure function during render

`Date.now` is an impure function. Calling an impure function can produce unstable results that update unpredictably when the component happens to re-render. (https://react.dev/reference/rules/components-and-hooks-must-be-pure#components-and-hooks-must-be-idempotent).

C:\Users\iknow\OneDrive\Desktop\gecp.in\src\components\ui\NoticeBoard.tsx:17:103
  15 |         { id: '1', title: 'Registration for New Clubs 2026 is now open', published_at: new Date().toISOString(), type: 'Notice' },
  16 |         { id: '2', title: 'Inter-College Robo-War Event scheduled for March 15th', published_at: new Date().toISOString(), type: 'Event' },
> 17 |         { id: '3', title: 'Drama Club: Auditions for Annual Play in SAC Hall', published_at: new Date(Date.now() - 86400000).toISOString(), type: 'Announcement' },
     |                                                                                                       ^^^^^^^^^^ Cannot call impure function
  18 |         { id: '4', title: 'Tech Symposium: Last date for paper submission extended', published_at: new Date(Date.now() - 172800000).toISOString(), type: 'Notice' },
  19 |     ];
  20 |

`Date.now` is an impure function. Calling an impure function can produce unstable results that update unpredictably when the component happens to re-render. (https://react.dev/reference/rules/components-and-hooks-must-be-pure#components-and-hooks-must-be-idempotent).

  19 |     ];

source:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, Users, ExternalLink, Calendar, MapPin, ChevronRight, Award } from 'lucide-react'; import NoticeBoard from '../components/ui/NoticeBoard'; import { supabase } from '../lib/supabase'; const Home = () => { const [featuredClubs, setFeaturedClubs] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchFeatured = async () => { const { data } = await supabase .from('clubs') .select('*') .eq('is_verified', true) .limit(3); if (data) setFeaturedClubs(data); setLoading(false); }; fetchFeatured(); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Empowering Excellence Through Student-Led Innovation

Welcome to the official repository for all recognized clubs and student chapters at College. Discover, engage, and lead in your area of passion.

Explore Clubs Register Your Club
CENTRAL HUB FOR STUDENT ACTIVITIES
{/* Background Decorative Element */}
{/* Notice & Feature Grid */}
{/* Main Feed */}

Featured Clubs

{loading ? ( [1, 2].map(i =>
) ) : featuredClubs.length > 0 ? ( featuredClubs.map(club => (
{club.logo_url ? : }

{club.name}

{club.category}

{club.short_description}

View Details
)) ) : (
No verified clubs featured at the moment.
)}
{/* Stats Bar */}
{[ { label: 'Active Clubs', value: '45+', icon: }, { label: 'Upcoming Events', value: '12', icon: }, { label: 'Verified Chapters', value: '18', icon: }, ].map((stat, i) => (
{stat.icon}
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Sidebar */}

Quickly Find a Club

Search by name, category, or interest area to get involved today.

{['Technical', 'Cultural', 'Sports', 'Photography'].map(tag => ( #{tag} ))}
{/* Footer-ish Info Section */}

Onboarding for New Students

Are you a freshman looking to join a club? Or a group of students wanting to start a new initiative? Read the official guidelines for club formations and membership rules established by the Student Affairs Commission.

); }; export default Home;
